amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 116-42 to include finding recognizing the role of oceans in the global climate system and international actions being taken to include oceans in the Paris Agreement's nationally determined contributions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Case amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Case amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Case.
